paip-python by dhconnelly

Peter Norvig's Paradigms of Artificial Intelligence Programming implemented in Python

classic AI programs, in a literate-programming style

  • General Problem Solver, means-ends analysis problem solving
  • Eliza, a pattern-matching psychiatrist

Authors

Daniel Connelly (dhconnelly@gmail.com)

Download

You can download this project in either zip or tar formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running: 

$ git clone git://github.com/dhconnelly/paip-python

get the source code on GitHub : dhconnelly/paip-python
